analysis.description:
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#762) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- investWithCustomerId (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#948-962)
	- invest (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#964-968)
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1031-1034)

Crowdsale.signerAddress (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#767) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- setRequireCustomerId (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1031-1034)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol:
	Contract EthTranchePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1001-1013):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1011)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1011-1012)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#862-905):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#866-877)
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#870-877)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#878-881)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#893)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#891-893)

BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1263-1277) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(teamAddresses[i],allocatedBonus) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1275-1276)

MintedEthCappedCrowdsale.assignTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1312-1317) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mintableToken.mint(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1315-1316)

BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(teamAddresses[i],allocatedBonus) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1275-1276)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#829-844):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#836)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#839-840)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#843-844)

	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#838)

Reentrancy in BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1263-1277):
	External calls:
	- tokensSold = crowdsale.tokensSold() (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1268)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedBonus (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1273-1275)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#862-905):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#866-877)
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#870-877)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#878-881)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#888-890)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#887)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#890-891)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#919-941):
	External calls:
	- weiAmount = (weiPrice * tokenAmount) / 10 ** uint256(token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#921-926)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#931-936)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#936-940)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#929-931)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#928-929)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1136-1151) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1148-1151)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#1148-1151)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#723-726)
Crowdsale.requiredSignedAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#762)
Crowdsale.signerAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#767)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#105-107)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0xd8698a985b89650d0a70f99ad2909bd0c0b4b51c.sol#236)
